00020 #include "../BuildVariables.h"
00021 #include "../BuildInputVariables.h"
00022 #include "../inputfile_parse/CSPSpec.h"

00024 namespace BuildCon
00025 {  
00026 
00029 template<ConstraintType constraint, int size>
00030 struct BuildConObj
00031 {
00032   template<typename ConData>
00033   static 
00034   AbstractConstraint* build(StateObj* stateObj, const ConData& partial_build, ConstraintBlob& b, int pos) _NOINLINE;
00035 };
00036 
00037 
00038 template<ConstraintType constraint, int size>
00039 template<typename ConData>
00040 AbstractConstraint* 
00041 BuildConObj<constraint, size>::
00042 build(StateObj* stateObj, const ConData& partial_build, ConstraintBlob& b, int pos)
00043 {
00044   const vector<Var>& vars = b.vars[pos];
00045   
00046   // type needs to be something for empty arrays
00047   int type = VAR_CONSTANT;
00048   bool same_type = true;
00049   
00050   if(!vars.empty())
00051   {
00052     type = vars[0].type();
00053     for(unsigned i = 1; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00054     {
00055         if(vars[i].type() != type)
00056         {
00057           same_type = false;
00058           break;
00059         }
00060     }
00061   }
00062   #ifndef QUICK_COMPILE
00063   if(same_type)
00064   {
00065     switch(type)
00066     {
00067       case VAR_BOOL:
00068       {
00069         vector<BoolVarRef> v(vars.size());
00070         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00071           v[i] = getVars(stateObj).getBooleanContainer().get_var_num(vars[i].pos());
00072         return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00073           build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00074       }
00075       case VAR_NOTBOOL:
00076       {
00077         vector<VarNot<BoolVarRef> > v(vars.size());
00078         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00079           v[i] = VarNotRef(getVars(stateObj).getBooleanContainer().get_var_num(vars[i].pos()));
00080         return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00081           build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00082       }
00083       case VAR_BOUND:
00084       {
00085         vector<BoundVarRef> v(vars.size());
00086         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00087           v[i] = getVars(stateObj).getBoundVarContainer().get_var_num(vars[i].pos());
00088         return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00089           build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00090       }     
00091       case VAR_SPARSEBOUND:
00092       {
00093         vector<SparseBoundVarRef> v(vars.size());
00094         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00095           v[i] = getVars(stateObj).getSparseBoundVarContainer().get_var_num(vars[i].pos());
00096         return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00097           build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00098       }
00099       case VAR_DISCRETE:
00100       {
00101         vector<BigRangeVarRef> v(vars.size());
00102         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00103           v[i] = getVars(stateObj).getBigRangeVarContainer().get_var_num(vars[i].pos());
00104         return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00105           build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00106       }
00107       case VAR_SPARSEDISCRETE:  
00108         INPUT_ERROR( "Sparse Discrete Variables current broken. Sorry");
00109         
00110       case VAR_CONSTANT:
00111       {
00112         vector<ConstantVar> v(vars.size());
00113         for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00114           v[i] = ConstantVar(stateObj, vars[i].pos());
00115         return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00116           build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00117       }
00118     }
00119   }
00120   else
00121   #endif
00122   {
00123     vector<AnyVarRef> v(vars.size());
00124     for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00125       v[i] = get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(stateObj, vars[i]);
00126     
00127     return BuildConObj<constraint, size - 1>::
00128       build(stateObj, make_pair(partial_build, &v), b, pos + 1);
00129   }
00130   // This FAIL_EXIT is here to stop a "no return in non-void function" warning. It should never be reached.
00131   INPUT_ERROR( "This should never be reached..");
00132 }  
00133 
00134 
00135 
00136 }

00138 AbstractConstraint*
00139 build_constraint(StateObj* stateObj, ProbSpec::ConstraintBlob& b);
